unnormalised: Breaking News: Local doctor bags national award!
normalised: Breaking News: Local doctor bags national award!

unnormalised: Dr. Aisha Khan, a familiar face at City Hospital, has just been awarded the "Healthcare Innovator of the Year" award. Many know her as Dr. Khan, but the award committee made sure to use the proper title, Doctor, during the official announcement. She's being recognised for her work in developing a low-cost diagnostic tool for rural healthcare.
normalised: Doctor Aisha Khan, a familiar face at City Hospital, has just been awarded the "Healthcare Innovator of the Year" award. Many know her as Doctor Khan, but the award committee made sure to use the proper title, Doctor, during the official announcement. She's being recognised for her work in developing a low-cost diagnostic tool for rural healthcare.

unnormalised: Her work has been praised by leading figures in the medical community. Prof. Sharma from AIIMS Delhi commented, "Dr. Khan's dedication is truly inspiring. This tool will make a real difference." Sources say that even senior physicians, like Dr. Menon, have expressed excitement about the tech.
normalised: Her work has been praised by leading figures in the medical community. Professor Sharma from A-I-I-M-S Delhi commented, "Doctor Khan's dedication is truly inspiring. This tool will make a real difference." Sources say that even senior physicians, like Doctor Menon, have expressed excitement about the tech.

unnormalised: The tool itself is quite impressive, reportedly cutting diagnostic costs by almost 70%. This allows more people, especially in rural areas, to get the testing they need. Nurse Patel added, "It’s so much easier to use than the old equipment! This will help us serve our patients better."
normalised: The tool itself is quite impressive, reportedly cutting diagnostic costs by almost seventy percent. This allows more people, especially in rural areas, to get the testing they need. Nurse Patel added, "It’s so much easier to use than the old equipment! This will help us serve our patients better."

unnormalised: Details about the award ceremony are still unfolding, but it is expected that she will be receiving the award from the Health Minister sometime next week.
normalised: Details about the award ceremony are still unfolding, but it is expected that she will be receiving the award from the Health Minister sometime next week.

unnormalised: Dr. Khan, or rather, Doctor Aisha Khan's, achievement is a proud moment for the entire city. It highlights the ingenuity and commitment of medical professionals here in India. We wish her all the best.
normalised: Doctor Khan, or rather, Doctor Aisha Khan's, achievement is a proud moment for the entire city. It highlights the ingenuity and commitment of medical professionals here in India. We wish her all the best.
